trans-unit.id: Blocking other content trackers may break some videos and Web pages.
trans-unit.source: Blocking other content trackers may break some videos and Web pages.
trans-unit.target: Het blokkeren van andere inhoud trackers kan video en web paginas breken.
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when toggling the Content blocker
Text displayed at the final step of the intro screen
Button at top of app that goes to the About screen
Label for instructions to enable shown on the second introduction screen
Instructions shown in main app when Focus is disabled in system settings

trans-unit.id: Focus helps you improve the privacy and performance of your mobile browsing experience. You control what types of page content are allowed.
trans-unit.source: Focus helps you improve the privacy and performance of your mobile browsing experience. You control what types of page content are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Focus verbeterts de privacy en snelheid van je mobile browser belevening. Jij kan controleren wat voor materiaal zal worden geladen.
trans-unit.note: Description text shown on the welcome slide of the tour

trans-unit.id: Focus improves privacy and may boost page load speed and lower your mobile data usage.
trans-unit.source: Focus improves privacy and may boost page load speed and lower your mobile data usage.
trans-unit.target: Focus verbetert de privacy en zal mogelijk de snelheid verbeteren waar pagina's mee worden geladen.
trans-unit.note: Label displayed above toggles
Text displayed at the final step of the intro screen
Error label when Focus is not enabled, shown in the intro and main app when Focus is disabled

trans-unit.id: Focus is produced by Mozilla, the people behind the Firefox Web browser.
trans-unit.source: Focus is produced by Mozilla, the people behind the Firefox Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Focus is gemaakt door Mozilla, de mensen van de Firefox Web browser.
trans-unit.note: About copy on the about page

trans-unit.id: Focus must be enabled in Settings to work.
trans-unit.source: Focus must be enabled in Settings to work.
trans-unit.target: Focus moet worden geactiveerd in de systeem instellingen.
trans-unit.note: Notice label show on second introduction screen

trans-unit.id: Focus puts you in control and brings added privacy and performance to your mobile browsing experience.
trans-unit.source: Focus puts you in control and brings added privacy and performance to your mobile browsing experience.
trans-unit.target: Focus zet you achter het stuur en geeft je controle over privacy en snelheid voor je mobile browsing belevenis.

trans-unit.id: Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.

trans-unit.target: Onze missie is om een beter, open en gezonder Internet te kweken.
